about.title: About Me
about.body:
I am a seasoned Program & Engineering Manager with over 20 years of experience leading global teams, shaping technical strategy, and delivering large-scale enterprise platforms. My career bridges product strategy, software architecture, and program delivery, consistently ensuring that complex initiatives translate into tangible business value.

I thrive at the intersection of technology and business: guiding cross-functional teams, mentoring engineers, and engaging directly with C-level stakeholders and international clients. My approach combines strategic vision with hands-on execution, enabling me to align technical excellence with business outcomes.

Key areas of focus include cloud-native architectures, digital transformation programs, and secure messaging platforms. In addition, I am actively building knowledge in Artificial Intelligence, through continuous training and experimentation. I apply AI daily to enhance project management efficiency, improve decision-making, and explore innovative approaches, while staying committed to responsible and ethical adoption.
